snippet: "Doom and Gloom," which made its debut on Thursday, is one of two new tracks that will be included on "GRRR!", a greatest-hits compilation celebrating the band's 50th anniversary.
abstract: "Doom and Gloom," which made its debut on Thursday, is one of two new tracks that will be included on "GRRR!", a greatest-hits compilation celebrating the band's 50th anniversary.

headline.main: The Rolling Stones Bemoan 'Doom and Gloom'
headline.print_headline:
Stones Roll Out
A New Song
